sql.where:
(hydbpt.borrow_project_type ='HZT' OR hydbpt.borrow_project_type ='HXF') AND hydb.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (( hydb.`status` = 4 AND hydb.repay_full_status = 0 ) OR ( hydb.`status` = 5))
AND ( hydb.`status` = 4 AND hydb.repay_full_status = 0 )
AND ( hydb.`status` = 5 )
AND hydbr.repay_time >= unix_timestamp(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND hydbr.repay_time <= unix_timestamp(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND hydbr.borrow_nid LIKE CONCAT( #{borrowNid}, '%')

if.test: (repayTimeOrder == null or repayTimeOrder =='') and (checkTimeOrder == null or checkTimeOrder =='')

mapper.select:
SELECT hbap.suc_amount, hbap.batch_service_fee, DATE_FORMAT(hbap.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS suc_time, hydb.borrow_nid, o.name as borrow_name, hydbpt.borrow_name AS project_type_name, hydb.project_type, hydb.borrow_style, hydb.borrow_apr AS borrow_interest, o.borrow_asset_number as borrow_asset_number, CASE WHEN hydb.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(hydb.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(hydb.borrow_period,'个月') END AS borrow_period, o.company_or_personal AS com_or_per, FROM_UNIXTIME( hydb.verify_time,'%Y-%m-%d' ) AS loan_time, hydb.account AS borrow_account, IF(hydb.`status` = 5,hydb.repay_account_yes,hydb.repay_account_all) AS borrow_total, CASE WHEN ( hydb.`status` = 4 AND hydb.repay_full_status = 0 ) THEN CASE
WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ht_borrow_apicron hydba WHERE hydba.borrow_nid = hydb.borrow_nid AND hydba.api_type = 1 AND hydba.`status` <> 6) THEN '2'
ELSE '0' END
WHEN ( hydb.`status` = 5) THEN '1' ELSE '' END AS `repay_status`, FROM_UNIXTIME(hydbr.repay_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS repay_time, hba.is_repay_org_flag AS repay_money_source, FROM_UNIXTIME( hydbr.repay_action_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS action_time, hydbr.repay_capital_yes AS capital_yes, hydbr.repay_account_yes AS account_yes, CASE WHEN ( hydb.borrow_style = 'endday' OR hydb.borrow_style = 'end' ) THEN hydbr.repay_account ELSE plan.repay_account END AS real_account_yes, CASE WHEN ( hydb.borrow_style = 'endday' OR hydb.borrow_style = 'end' ) THEN hydbr.repay_fee ELSE plan.repay_fee END AS repay_fee, hydbr.repay_fee AS all_repay_fee FROM ht_borrow hydb left join ht_borrow_info o on hydb.borrow_nid = o.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type hydbpt ON hydbpt.borrow_cd = hydb.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_repay hydbr ON hydbr.borrow_nid = hydb.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_apicron hba ON hba.borrow_nid = hydb.borrow_nid AND hba.api_type = 1 AND hba.`status` <> 6 AND CASE WHEN hydb.borrow_style in ('endday','end') THEN hba.period_now = 1 ELSE hba.period_now = (hydb.borrow_period - hydbr.repay_period + 1) END LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_apicron hbap ON hbap.borrow_nid = hydb.borrow_nid AND hbap.api_type = 0 AND hbap.`status` = 6 LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_repay_plan plan ON plan.borrow_nid = hydb.borrow_nid AND plan.repay_period = ( hydb.borrow_period - hydbr.repay_period + 1 )
ORDER BY
LIMIT #{limitStart,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{limitEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT hydb.borrow_nid, o.name as borrow_name, hydbpt.borrow_name AS project_type, hydb.borrow_style, hydb.borrow_apr AS borrow_interest, o.borrow_asset_number as borrow_asset_number, CASE WHEN hydb.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(hydb.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(hydb.borrow_period,'个月') END AS borrow_period, o.company_or_personal AS com_or_per, FROM_UNIXTIME( hydb.verify_time,'%Y-%m-%d' ) AS loan_time, hydb.account AS borrow_account, hydb.repay_account_all AS borrow_total, CASE WHEN ( hydb.`status` = 4 AND hydb.repay_full_status = 0 ) THEN CASE
WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ht_borrow_apicron hydba WHERE hydba.borrow_nid = hydb.borrow_nid AND hydba.api_type = 1 AND hydba.status <> 6) THEN '2'
ELSE '0' END
WHEN ( hydb.`status` = 5) THEN '1' ELSE '' END AS `repay_status`, FROM_UNIXTIME(hydbr.repay_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS repay_time, FROM_UNIXTIME( hydbr.repay_action_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS action_time, hba.is_repay_org_flag AS repay_money_source, hydbr.repay_capital_yes AS capital_yes, CASE WHEN ( hydb.borrow_style = 'endday' OR hydb.borrow_style = 'end' ) THEN hydbr.repay_account ELSE plan.repay_account END AS account_yes, CASE WHEN ( hydb.borrow_style = 'endday' OR hydb.borrow_style = 'end' ) THEN hydbr.repay_account ELSE plan.repay_account END AS real_account_yes, CASE WHEN ( hydb.borrow_style = 'endday' OR hydb.borrow_style = 'end' ) THEN hydbr.repay_fee ELSE plan.repay_fee END AS repay_fee, hydbr.repay_fee AS all_repay_fee, hydbr.repay_period, hydb.borrow_period AS borrow_all_period, CASE WHEN hydb.borrow_style = 'endday' or hydb.borrow_style = 'end' THEN FROM_UNIXTIME(hydbr.repay_time,'%Y-%m-%d') ELSE FROM_UNIXTIME(plan.repay_time,'%Y-%m-%d') END AS repayYesTime FROM ht_borrow hydb
left join ht_borrow_info o on hydb.borrow_nid = o.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type hydbpt ON hydbpt.borrow_cd = hydb.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_repay hydbr ON hydbr.borrow_nid = hydb.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_apicron hba ON hba.borrow_nid = hydb.borrow_nid AND hba.api_type = 1 AND hba.`status` <> 6 AND CASE WHEN hydb.borrow_style in ('endday','end') THEN hba.period_now = 1 ELSE hba.period_now = (hydb.borrow_period - hydbr.repay_period + 1) END LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_repay_plan plan ON plan.borrow_nid = hydb.borrow_nid AND plan.repay_period = ( hydb.borrow_period - hydbr.repay_period + 1 )
ORDER BY repay_status, hydbr.repay_time
DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{limitEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}

sql.where:
(hydbpt.borrow_project_type ='HZT' OR hydbpt.borrow_project_type ='HXF') AND hydb.repay_org_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (( hydb.`status` = 4 AND hydb.repay_full_status = 0 ) OR ( hydb.`status` = 5))
AND ( hydb.`status` = 4 AND hydb.repay_full_status = 0 )
AND ( hydb.`status` = 5 )
AND hydbr.repay_time >= unix_timestamp(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND hydbr.repay_time <= unix_timestamp(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND hba.id is null
AND hydbr.borrow_nid LIKE CONCAT( #{borrowNid}, '%')

mapper.select:
select hydb.borrow_nid, hba.batch_service_fee, hydb.plan_nid, hydb.borrow_period, hydb.account, hba.suc_amount, hydb.borrow_apr, hydb.borrow_apr, CASE WHEN hydb.`status` = 1 AND hydb.verify_status = 3 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( hydb.ontime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) ELSE FROM_UNIXTIME( hydb.verify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) END AS send_time, FROM_UNIXTIME( hydb.borrow_full_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) AS full_time, hydbs.name as borrow_style, FROM_UNIXTIME(hydb.recover_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS recover_last_time, hydb.project_type, -- hydb.borrow_extra_yield, CASE WHEN hydb.`status` = 1 AND hydb.verify_status = 3 THEN '10' WHEN hydb.`status` = 2 AND hydb.borrow_full_status = 0 AND ( hydb.verify_time + ( hydb.borrow_valid_time * 24 * 60 * 60 ) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) ) THEN '11' WHEN hydb.`status` = 3 THEN '12' WHEN hydb.`status` = 4 THEN '13' WHEN hydb.`status` = 5 THEN '14' ELSE '' END AS borrow_status from ht_borrow hydb LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style hydbs ON hydb.borrow_style = hydbs.nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_apicron hba ON hba.borrow_nid = hydb.borrow_nid AND hba.api_type = 0 AND hba.`status` = 6
hydb.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select COUNT(1) from ht_credit_tender where bid_nid = #{borrowNid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select COUNT(1) from ht_hjh_debt_credit_tender where borrow_nid = #{borrowNid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select u.username as undertaker_user_name, ct.credit_user_id, hu.username as credit_user_name, ct.assign_capital, ct.assign_price, DATE_FORMAT(ct.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i')AS assign_order_date, ct.assign_pay from ht_credit_tender ct LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u on u.user_id = ct.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user hu on hu.user_id = ct.credit_user_id where bid_nid = #{borrowNid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
LIMIT #{limitStart,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{limitEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(htbr.repay_fee),0) FROM ht_borrow htb LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type htbpt ON htbpt.borrow_cd = htb.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_repay htbr ON htbr.borrow_nid = htb.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_apicron htba ON htba.borrow_nid = htb.borrow_nid AND htba.api_type = 1 AND htba.`status` = 6 AND htba.period_now = 1 WHERE (htbpt.borrow_project_type = 'HZT' OR htbpt.borrow_project_type = 'HXF') AND htb.borrow_style in ('endday','end') AND htba.id is null AND htb.user_id = #{userId} AND ((htb.`status` = 4 AND htb.repay_full_status = 0) OR (htb.`status` = 8 AND htb.repay_full_status = 0) )

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(htbr.repay_fee),0) FROM ht_borrow htb LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type htbpt ON htbpt.borrow_cd = htb.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_repay_plan htbr ON htbr.borrow_nid = htb.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_apicron htba ON htba.borrow_nid = htb.borrow_nid AND htba.api_type = 1 AND htba.`status` = 6 AND htba.period_now = htbr.repay_period WHERE (htbpt.borrow_project_type = 'HZT' OR htbpt.borrow_project_type = 'HXF') AND htba.id is null AND htb.user_id = #{userId} AND ((htb.`status` = 4 AND htb.repay_full_status = 0) OR (htb.`status` = 8 AND htb.repay_full_status = 0))

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(htbr.repay_fee),0) FROM ht_borrow htb INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info htbi ON htb.borrow_nid = htbi.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type htbpt ON htbpt.borrow_cd = htb.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_repay htbr ON htbr.borrow_nid = htb.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_apicron htba ON htba.borrow_nid = htb.borrow_nid AND htba.api_type = 1 AND htba.`status` = 6 AND htba.period_now = 1 WHERE (htbpt.borrow_project_type = 'HZT' OR htbpt.borrow_project_type = 'HXF') AND htb.borrow_style in ('endday','end') AND htba.id is null AND htbi.repay_org_user_id = #{userId} AND ((htb.`status` = 4 AND htb.repay_full_status = 0) OR (htb.`status` = 8 AND htb.repay_full_status = 0))

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(htbr.repay_fee),0) FROM ht_borrow htb INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info htbi ON htb.borrow_nid = htbi.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type htbpt ON htbpt.borrow_cd = htb.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_repay_plan htbr ON htbr.borrow_nid = htb.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_apicron htba ON htba.borrow_nid = htb.borrow_nid AND htba.api_type = 1 AND htba.`status` = 6 AND htba.period_now = htbr.repay_period WHERE (htbpt.borrow_project_type = 'HZT' OR htbpt.borrow_project_type = 'HXF') AND htba.id is null AND htbi.repay_org_user_id = #{userId} AND ((htb.`status` = 4 AND htb.repay_full_status = 0) OR (htb.`status` = 8 AND htb.repay_full_status = 0))
SELECT count(*) FROM ht_hjh_plan_borrow_tmp tmp JOIN ht_hjh_debt_credit hhdc ON hhdc.credit_nid = tmp.borrow_nid WHERE tmp.borrow_type = 1 AND hhdc.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid}
